review: Bought this when net gear range extender didn't resolve issue.  Great for Netflix, but I want Amazon Prime, etc like I have with ROKU on upstairs TV.
author: SARAH S WILLIAMS

review: Works great. its so simple to set up.
author: Natalie

review: 2 big disappointments. It crashes about every 30 minutes after casting. There is significant lag and skips when casting a video from chrome to the tv...even at 480p I get almost no performance at 720p. And it's not an issue of router bandwidth, it's a fairly new and advanced wide-range wide-bandwidth router with nothing else running. It does cast audio only very well. but for things with video, they need to keep working on it.
author: T. D. G.

review: I USE WITH MY NOOK AND IF I WANT TO LISTEN TO VIDEOS I USE MY SMARTPHONE IS VERY LIBERATINGLOVE IT!!
author: john rivera
